member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS
member.summary: Contains statistical information from the exFAT file system.

member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS.SuccessfulCreates
member.summary: The number of successful create operations.

member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS.FailedCreates
member.summary: The number of failed create operations.

member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS.NonCachedReads
member.summary: The number of read operations that were not cached.

member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS.NonCachedReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from a file that were not cached.

member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS.NonCachedWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations that were not cached.

member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS.NonCachedWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to a file that were not cached.

member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS.NonCachedDiskReads
member.summary: The number of read operations that were not cached. This value includes sub-read operations.

member.name: EXFAT_STATISTICS.NonCachedDiskWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations that were not cached. This value includes sub-write operations.
